title: El Salvador
summary: Citi El Salvador, established in 1964, is a leader in Corporate & Investment Banking in the country and is focused on transactional and structured solutions for the largest local companies, subsidiaries of multinational companies, financial institutions, and the public sector. The team has strong expertise across Citi's array of products and key local industries.
tag-2: For more than 58 years, Citi has enabled economic growth in El Salvador.
